hero.headline: Engage with
hero.subtitle: Turn anonymous visitors into loyal guests.

problemSolution.headline: Transform every touchpoint
problemSolution.subtitle: See what changes when you replace disconnected tools with a unified engagement platform.

rows.pain: Fragmented guest data across disconnected systems
rows.solution: Unified guest profiles across all channels
AI-powered personalization across email, push, SMS, and in-app

rows.pain: No native app for your destination
rows.solution: White-label native app with mobile commerce and geo-fencing
Tiered membership & loyalty programs with gamification

rows.pain: Basic e-commerce, limited to single-channel sales

quotes.text: The LAAX app is the platform allowing us to become truly customer centered and to drive digital revenue at scale.
The digital guest experience now matches the world-class quality of our mountain infrastructure.
Creating a unique symbiosis between the real and digital world for every mountain biker.
Step by step we can orchestrate the digital customer experience more personalized than ever before.

productDemo.headline: The key to your resort.
productDemo.subtitle: A white-label native app for iOS & Android that becomes the digital heartbeat of your destination — personalized, data-driven, and loved by guests.
productDemo.basedOn: Based on the Inside LAAX app — LAAX Resort, Switzerland

pillars.label: For You
pillars.desc: All the information you need to plan your adventure. From dining to trails, everything is personalized to your stay.
features: Curated content — activity & full day guides

pillars.label: Live
pillars.desc: Real-time data & periodic updates of resort operations & conditions.
features: Map-based slope & trail status by season

pillars.label: Shop
pillars.desc: A powerful mobile storefront — browse, book, and buy in a few taps.

pillars.label: Play
pillars.desc: Gamification and community features that keep guests engaged.

pillars.label: Wallet
pillars.desc: Manage tickets, guestcards, payments and loyalty — all in one place.

cta.headline: Ready to engage with intelligence?
cta.subtitle: See how Inside Labs can transform your guest engagement. Get a personalized walkthrough with your own data.

footer.tagline: Engage with Intelligence. Tourism's leading data-driven customer engagement platform.

tabs.label: Know your guests
tabs.headline: Know your guests
tabs.body1: Build unified guest profiles that connect every interaction — from first website visit to on-mountain purchase — into a single, actionable view.
tabs.body2: Automated segmentation and predictive scoring surface your most valuable guests and the moments that matter most.
bullets: Unified guest profiles across all channels
Automated journey mapping & segmentation
Predictive engagement scoring
Real-time behavioral triggers

tabs.label: Reach them personally
tabs.headline: Reach them personally
tabs.body1: Deliver the right message, on the right channel, at the right moment — powered by AI that learns what each guest responds to.
tabs.body2: Orchestrate email, push, SMS, and in-app messaging from one place with built-in multi-language support.
bullets: AI-powered message optimization
Smart channel selection per user
Multi-language content generation
Real-time performance analytics

tabs.label: Drive revenue
tabs.headline: Drive revenue
tabs.body1: Turn every touchpoint into a revenue opportunity with AI-powered campaigns that optimize timing, channel, and offer automatically.
tabs.body2: Real-time attribution shows exactly which campaigns drive bookings, so you double down on what works.
bullets: Cross-channel campaign orchestration
Dynamic audience segmentation
A/B testing with auto-optimization
Revenue attribution tracking

tabs.label: Bring them back
tabs.headline: Bring them back
tabs.body1: Design tiered membership programs with intelligent rewards that keep guests engaged season after season.
tabs.body2: Automated tier progression and personalized perks turn one-time visitors into lifetime advocates.
bullets: Flexible tier structures & rewards
Points, perks & exclusive access
Automated tier progression
Member analytics dashboard

omniComparison.headline: Start simple. Scale to extraordinary.
omniComparison.subtitle: Every tier builds on the last — pick where you are today, and grow when you're ready.

Natively sell every product in your catalog

products.name: Omni Endeavour
products.tagline: Gamification, loyalty, and limitless data streaming.
products.description: Unlock the full platform with limitless data streaming, individualized loyalty programs, and sophisticated gamification.
features: Stream all data into your systems

laax.story: LAAX transformed from a traditional ski resort into a digitally-native destination experience. The Inside LAAX app became the single touchpoint for tickets, rentals, loyalty, and real-time mountain conditions — driving a 300% increase in online sales and putting mobile commerce at the centre of the guest journey.
bullets: White-label native app with integrated ticketing and mobile commerce
Gamification layer with challenges, leaderboards, and loyalty rewards
Real-time lift status, snow reports, and personalised push notifications
50% of all ticket sales migrated to in-app purchases
laax.quote: The LAAX app is the platform allowing us to become truly customer centered and to drive digital revenue at scale.

zermatt.story: Zermatt Bergbahnen needed a digital companion worthy of the Matterhorn. The result: a native app delivering live lift status, piste conditions, and a personalised guest journey — achieving 116k downloads and over 2.6 million interactions in its first seasons.
bullets: Live lift and piste status with real-time mountain data feeds
Interactive trail maps with GPS tracking and elevation profiles
Personalised recommendations based on skill level and weather
Multi-language support for Zermatt's international audience
zermatt.quote: The digital guest experience now matches the world-class quality of our mountain infrastructure.

estm.story: Engadin St. Moritz embarked on a full digital transformation spanning six interconnected sub-projects — from a headless CMS powering all digital touchpoints to a 360° CRM unifying guest data across bookings, activities, and communications.
bullets: Headless CMS architecture powering web, app, and digital signage
Unified 360° guest CRM aggregating data from all channels
Multi-destination content hub serving sub-regions and partners
Integrated commerce layer for events, experiences, and packages
estm.quote: Step by step we can orchestrate the digital customer experience more personalized than ever before.

bikekingdom.story: Bike Kingdom turned Lenzerheide into a gamified mountain biking destination. Riders earn XP on trails, compete on leaderboards, and unlock rewards — driving a 10.2% e-commerce conversion rate and a loyal community of 40,000+ users.
bullets: Trail gamification with XP, badges, and seasonal challenges
GPS-tracked rides with automatic segment timing and leaderboards
Integrated e-commerce for day passes, bike rentals, and gear
Community features connecting riders and sharing trail conditions
bikekingdom.quote: Creating a unique symbiosis between the real and digital world for every mountain biker.

schwyz.story: Schwyz Tourismus partnered with Inside Labs to build a multi-region analytics platform spanning four phases — from KPI definition and data integration to automated dashboards that transformed how the region measures tourism performance.
bullets: Multi-region KPI framework aligning diverse tourism stakeholders
Automated dashboards consolidating data from 12+ sources
Phased rollout ensuring adoption at every organisational level
Predictive models for visitor flow and seasonal demand planning
schwyz.quote: The dashboard creates a data-based foundation for groundbreaking decisions across our entire region.

surselva.story: mia SURSELVA created a regional guest platform unifying the entire Surselva region under one digital experience — a guest card with integrated benefits, a discovery feed for activities, and a shop connecting visitors to local partners.
bullets: Digital guest card with automatic benefit activation on check-in
Integrated regional shop for activities, transport, and experiences
Explore feed with personalised recommendations by location and interest
Membership tier system rewarding repeat visitors across the region
surselva.quote: Leveraging the technological capabilities of Omni Suite, we built an innovative digital ecosystem for the entire region.

awards: Best of Swiss Apps — Gold Design
Best of Swiss Apps — Gold Business

statsHero.label: Annual revenue through the Omni Suite

originStory.headline: Born from the mountain.
originStory.subtitle: We didn't build tourism software from a boardroom. We built it from the slopes of one of Europe's largest ski resorts — because we lived the problems we set out to solve.

milestones.title: The Problem
milestones.description: Inside LAAX's Weisse Arena Gruppe, guest systems were fragmented — ticketing, gastronomy, mountain data all siloed. We saw it firsthand every day.

milestones.title: The Founding
milestones.description: Kristian Paasila, Daniel Medina, and Reto Gurtner founded Inside Labs AG. The INSIDE LAAX app launched with live mountain data, lift ticketing, and mobile ordering.

milestones.title: Validation
milestones.description: Top 10 in the Swiss App Store — ahead of Airbnb. Gold at Best of Swiss Apps for Design and Business. The approach was working.

milestones.title: Independence
milestones.description: Management buyout made Inside Labs 100% team-owned. Won the MILESTONE Award for Innovation. Started building the Omni Suite to bring what worked at LAAX to every destination.

milestones.title: Scaling
milestones.description: Bike Kingdom. Zermatt. Engadin St. Moritz. mia Surselva. Schwyz. Six destinations live, 300k+ annual users, CHF 30M+ in mobile revenue. The platform we wished existed — now powering the Alps.

teamSection.headline: Tourism in our DNA.
teamSection.description: We don't just build for tourism — we come from it. Our team grew up in one of Europe's largest ski resorts, with tourism deep in our DNA.

product.headline: One platform. Every guest touchpoint.
product.subtitle: From first discovery to loyal advocate — know your guests, reach them personally, drive revenue, and bring them back.

useCases.headline: The destinations proving it works.
useCases.subtitle: From 200k app users to CHF 19M in mobile revenue — see how Europe's leading alpine destinations transformed their guest experience.

about.headline: Built from the slopes.
about.subtitle: From a single ski resort to six Alpine destinations.

page.subtitle: Guides, strategies, interviews, and product updates from the team building tourism's most advanced engagement platform.
